name: Captn Salmon
description:
Slide left or right in response to citizens reasonable (and unreasonable) demands; unlock Captn Salmon's lost powers, solve mysteries, complete missions, meet new characters, thwart evil doers, recruit a sidekick, save pets, rock a dance off, fall in love and more.

Can you uncover Captn Salmon’s super abilities while keeping life in balance? Will you save the city and stop the end of days? Or you could just sit back, grab a Pina Colada and watch the world burn?

Don't be afraid to fail. You will always get a do-over in this respawn adventure card game.
